title: HIV Cure: Nigerian Professor taking steps to harmonise findings — University - Premium Times
text: HIV Cure: Nigerian Professor taking steps to harmonise findings — University Premium Times The Deputy Vice Chancellor (DVC) of the university, Nbibisi Iwe, made this known in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) on Friday in Lagos. Mr. Iwe, a professor of agriculture, explained that Mr. Ezeibe, who is a researcher at the same …
